1b-97a5 chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po sarba d+harma mahA san ti bo de tsi ta ku la ya rA dza byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po// lta ba namkhA ltar mthA dbus med pa'i rgyud//namkha'i snying po mchogi don// gsang ba mchogi mdo lung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal seng ge mgon po dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 1 byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/ /gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang poMW2PD19896ka1I2PD200151

97a5-103b5 chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems su 'dus pa'i mdo sarba d+harmA a ti mahA/ bo d+hi tsi ta su tra de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs chen de dag thaMd// ston pa kun tu bzang po'i spyan sngar// rab tu shin tu mdun pa'i sgo nas 'khod de// thaMd mgrin gcig pa'i sgo nas zhus pa// ston pa kun tu bzang pos ni// chos rnams kun tu snang bar mdzad// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' des// don de rtsa ba gcig tu bstan// rtsa ba gcig gi don bstan pa// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba rtogs// zhes zhuso// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des// chos thams cad rtsa ba gcig pa'i mdo dang// 'grel pa 'digsungso// chos kun rtsa ba gcig pa 'di lta ste// chos nyid sems nyid gcig tu bstan pa la// grangs dang rnam pa yongs kyis bgrang du med// ma bcos rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ti bya namkha'i lam la mkhas pa bzhin// mi rtog namkhA lta bur gnas par bya// rgyu rkyen ma byung rkyen med ma skyes pa'i// thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po byang chub la// yod pa'i sgros dang med pa'i skur pa dang// yin min sgro skur btags pa ga la yod// ces gsungso// ces byang chub kyi sems kyi mdo dang 'grel pa rdzogso 1 byang chub kyi sems kyi 'grel ba// rdzogs pa chen po'i mdo bcu las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang poMW2PD19896ka1I2PD200151

150b3-159b4 la zlo gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos// blo thag gcad cing bstan pa gtad pa 'di gsungs so// kye sems dpa' chen po da nyon cig/ chos nyid byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin spros pa ni// byang chub sems ni blo yis bsams pa men// bsams shing brtags pa'i chos ni rigs byed ye shes yin// rang byung ye shes rang shar de la med pa na// blo yis bsams shing bsgoms pa'i chos la re ma 'jog/ chos rnams kun gyi thag ni byang chub semsu gcad// ma bltas ma bsgoms bsams pa med pas thag chod na// de la rang byung ye shes shar bas /thag der gcad// chos sku d+migsumed par sems dpas blo thag chod// 'dod yon longs sku yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// phan sems sprul sku yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// snang ba rang sems yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// sems la gnyisu med pas bag chags sbyang du med// yul med rang gsal yin par sems dpas blo thag chod// thig le nyag gcig sems kyi rang bzhin yin mod kyang// nyag gcig cir yang 'byung bas spong dang sgrub ma byed// kun kyang yon tan mnyam pas sems dpas blo thag chod// da ltar snang ba'i rgyu lus 'di kun sems dpas ji ltar dgongs// 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul tsam du sems dpas dgongs mdzod la// sems ni bla med namkhA lta bu blo thag chod// kye sems dpa' chen po da dgongs shig/ rtsa rgyud le'u lnga bcu rtsa bdun gsungs pa yang// rang byung ye shes tshig tu bstan pa'i mdo lung yin// sems las rang byung ye shes gcig tu la zlos cig/ phyi ma le'u bcu dang gnyisu gsungs pa yang// rang byung ye shes bsams pas btags pa yin// da yang rang byung gcig tu sems dpas la zlos gcig/ phyi ma'i phyi ma le'u bcu dang lnga ru gsungs pa yang// rang byung ye shes rnal 'byor 'jog pa yin// sems dpa' rang byung ye shes gcig tu la zlos cig/ thos pas ston pa'i lde mig dang// bsam pas grol ba'i lde mig dang// bsgoms pas 'byin pa'i lde mig gis// nges par gtan la phab pa na// sems dpas legs par thag chod cig/ sems dpa' chen po da dgongs cig/ la zlos gsang ba'i 'khor lo 'khor ba'i srog gcod 'di/ sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la 'di gtado// blo ldan skal ba can la 'di gsungs 159b4-165a6 chos thaMd byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa namkhA dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harma mahA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa mU la tshed A kA sha sa ma na ak+Sha tan+t+ra de nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// cir snang de bzhin nyidu cig/ 'di la bcos slad ma byed cig/ ma bcos mnyam pa'i rgyal po de// mi rtog chos sku'i dgongs par gnas// skye med lta ba stong pa nyid// kun khyab sgom pa gnyisu med// 'khrul spyod sems kyi rgyan du rol// rtog pa'i 'bras bu thig ler gcig/ dus gsum gcig la khyad par med// gtan tshigs bzhi ru gcig pa'i phyir// nga la byung zhing nga ru thim// nga yi rang bzhin 'od gsalo// e ma sems dpa' rdo rje che// namkha'imthA ltar longs spyod pas// chos dbyings skye ba zad mi shes// bdud rtsi'i thig pa lce la zhog/ rgyal po btson du gzung pa dang// /gangs rtse nas ni brnyil ba ste// shing rta'i gzer 'og gcad par bya// namkhA ltar yi ge med pa'i rgyud// rang rig sems kyi dkyil du chongs// thugs rje ye shes rol par 'char// e ma kun bzang rgyal ba yab// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs zab cing yangs// namkha'lta bu'i rgyud bstan pa// ming tshig yi ge med bstan la// bstan du 'ong ba ci yi phir// bcom ldan kun bzang bka' stsal pa// mtshon du med pa'i chos nyid la// mtshon du med pa'i tshig brjod nas// mtshon pa'i tshig las rnam par grol// legso seMda' rdo rje che// don dam yi ge med pa'i rgyud// khyod la gtado bde ba che// rang byung ye shes rgyas thob la// thig le nyag gcig ngang la zhog/ kun tu bzang po bde ba che// thig le chen po'i yi ge med// bya ba med pas rnam par grol// grol nas grol ba'i lam yang shar// kun rig sems la mngon par bstod// chos thaMd namkha'i mthA dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud// bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing ha dang// bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o// 1 namkhA dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud las/ /gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang poMW2PD19896ka1I2PD200151

165a6-172b2 chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor brtsad nas gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa rnyogs pa med pa'i rgyud sarba d+harmaH mahA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la tshe d+ha sa muN+Da sa man+ta na bi la tan+t+ra de nas bcom ldan 'di skad gsungs// e ma ho// sangs rgyas thaMd kyi// chos kyi dbyings ni yi ge med// rang bzhin 'od gsal yongsu dag/ namkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// bdud rtsi dri med rgyu ldan mtsho// namkhA la nyi shar 'od zer lnga/ dbus na namkhA bzhi yi mthong// gting ni rin chen bcud gsum gter// bde gshegs mi mchod rang sems mchod// rang sems sangs rgyas yin pa las// sangs rgyas gzhan du mi btsal te// rig pa rang grol bya btsal bral// rang snang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'di// dper na rmi lam lta bu ste// rmi lam bde sdug sna tshogs yang// gnyid sad dus na chos kyi sku// tshangs pa khyab 'jug la sogs bsgom// log pa'i lam du zhugs pa'o// namkhA lta bur sems 'gag pa// nyi tshe ba yi stong par lhung// mi gtsang keng rus la sogs bsgom// phyi yi sgrib pa can dang mtshungs// 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug sgom byed pa// skye mched bzhi las thar lam med// phung po gtan tshigs gzhigs nas bsgom// de ka rtog par shes par gyis// lha dang dkyil 'khor zhal phyag bsgom// med par sgro yis /btags pa yin// rtsa rlung thig ler bde ba 'dzin// ro myags mngal gyi srin bu mtshungs// skad cig snang srid lha ru gsal// 'di ni rtsol ba'i nad du 'gyur// zhi gnas 'thibs po bsgoms byed pa// ma he glang dang khyad par med// gsal ba phyi nang med par sems// rnam rig pas kyang shin tu gsog/ kun yin gang ma yin sogs pa// a tir khas 'che mu stegs chos// rdzogs chen ris med bya btsal bral// rgya chad phyogs lhung med pa'i phyir// re shig rdzogs chen rol par mtshon// sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la gtad// sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste// slob dpon snying ston gdams ngag thob// mtshams med gsum gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas// pha ma bsad pa'i 'bras bu gter// lta bas d+myal ba shin tu che// snang ba thams cad rdzun la ma khyer// ci spyod mo sham bu bzhin spyod// 'khor ba'i chos la chags pa skyed// bya lam khamsu gcig tu gdod// 'gro drug magtoD seMn gnyis// sprul sku d+myal ba'i gnasu 'gro/ gangga''i chu dang se na'i mtsho// khyod kyi rtag tu bsres la 'thung// yum gyi bha ga rtag tu ltos// btsun mo des kyang me long ston// ldem po dgongs pa ma go bar// sgra bzhin spyad na log pa'i lam// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpa' bo ce// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung dang// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho 'di las byung// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// rba rlabs med pa'i mnyam nyid mtsho// rnyog ma med pa'i dri med chu// gdod nas dag pa'i bdud rtsi 'dis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i dri ma khrus// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// chedu ston pa 'di brjodo// kun rig thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// zab mo bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos// chos nyid byin rlabs rol pa yis// rnyogs med rgya mtsho'i klong ston pa// mnyam nyid rgya mtsho lta bu yis// kun tu bzang po mngon par bstod// chos thaMd rgya mtsho mthA dang mnyam pa rnyog ma med pa'i rgyud las// bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi khan po shrI sid+ha dang// bod kyi lo ts+tsha bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

de nas 'khor la gdam ngag du gnang ba// bsgom bsgrub kun dang bral ba yi// ting 'dzin 'dis ni btsal dang bral// dang po'i 'du ba chud ma zod// bar du bsam pa thag chod pa// tha mar sems chos shes pa ste// mi d+migs pa la gang gnas pa// de ni rtsal dang bral ba'o// bde bar gshegs pas gtad rgya dang bcas pa rdzogso// //bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa na dang/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar bhas sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o 1 yi ge med pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang poMW2PD19896ka1I2PD200151

269b5-283b7 rgyud kyi rgyal po gser gyi rus sbal rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i rgyud tan tra rA dza swa na ha sa da badzra da ri ha bi tan tra rgyud gyi rgyal po gser gyi rus sbal rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i rgyud// rgyud gyi ma mo// sems phyogs kyi phyi mo// lta ba thams cad kyi phugs dgongs pa'i gdeng rdzogso// //sa ma ya so phag shi kha thams// nor 'dod bu pho dge slong bdag 'dra yis// rin chen sna lnga'i snying po gser khyer nas// rin chen srog la ma 'dzems dka' ba'i la rnams bsgal// nges pa'i snying po byang sems rgyud mad rtsa gnyis btsal// 'jam dpal bshes gnyen bla ma dang// bdag 'dra bai ro tsa na yis// sgra skad bstun te chan la phab nas kyang// bod kyi yul du rmongs pa tshan gsum byung ba cha mchis nas// 'dir drangs mnga' bdag rgyal po nyid kyi phyag tu phul// rmongs pa tshan gsum dus na dar bar shog/ dang po bai ro tsa nas bsgyur// de nas lho brag nas khyung grags kyis gter nas gton pa'o 1 zhes ston pa nyid sku che ba'i yon tan dang ldan nas// thugs rjes phyi rabs kyi don du bstan pa/ gleng gzhi'i le'u dang poMW2PD19896ka1I2PD200151

sku ste/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku sku yi rgyal/ /mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug /yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra/ /sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog /sangyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed//ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don bgyid pa/ /lha'i dbang po lha'i lha/ /lha'i bdag po lha min bdag /'chi med dbang po lha yi lha/ /'jom byed 'jom byed dbang phyag po/ /rdo rje seMda' / seMda' che/ /ston pa gcig po 'gro ba'i bla/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang/ /'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa/ /chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po/ /byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste/ /snying rje yi ni ya la dgod/ /sangyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa/ /dpaldan sangyas pad+ma skyes/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje dkyil dkrungs rdzogsangyas/ /shes rab chen po skad cig la/ /chos kun khong du chud pa po/ /chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste/ /rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal/ /rdo rje blo gros don chen byed/ /kun tu bzang po'i gtso bo ste/ /'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo gsel/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa tho/ /rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod/ /chos kyi ghande sgra bo che/ /phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga bo che/ /chos kyi 184b1-294b4 spros bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba ti la ka du ha ka la tra du // ti la ka du ha ka la/ tan+t+ra mahA nA ma tan+t+ra ra' dza ma ha'/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor don gsal chen po'i rgyud mthong bas grol ba 'di// yongsu rdzogso// //slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi sgra rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //guhya/ gtad rgya rgya rgya/ ethi/ yang gsang ba'i man ngag gi rgyud chen po 'di sdud pa'i 'khor dga' rab rdo rjes sdus nas tshig dang yi ger bkod nas/ gu ru 'jam dpal bshes /gnyen la bshad// des gu ru shri sring ha la bshad des oyan gu ru pad+ma la bshad// oyan pad+ma 'byung gnas ngas/ snga brgya dus kyi snyig ma la/ ldan gsum skyes bu'i don ched du// chos rnams kun gyi ma chen mo// kun bskyed rang bzhung tshugs shing tshogs// spros bral don gsal rgyud chen sbas// sems can sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor don// thos bsam sgom la mi ltos shing// bstan pas rtogs shing dran pas gsal/ /'phrad pas dbang thob mthong bas grol// 'bras bu da ltar thob pa'i chos// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yin// thugs gter yang gter gsang mdzod 'dis// ma tshang kha skong brul mtsho sdud// 'phrad thogs nyamsublangs mchog ma// snying nor yin no mig 'bras yin// bdag kyang thos chung ma yin te/ /rdo rje 'chang dang mkhyen rab mnyam// de phyir thugs kyi gsang gter 'di// gnam sa'i bar na gter cig ma'o// las 'phro can dang 'phrad nas kyang// bco lnga'i lo bar yid la brnag/ gsang dam dam bsrung dus thal tshe// 'khor ba blos btang des don 'tshol// bla ma la gus srog 'dor phod// gsum la dpe bstod kun la min// dus la babs nas 'gro don yang// snyan rgyud du thob nas skal ldan skyong// rgyud mchog bla med nub dgongs nas// rgyud 'di gter kha gsum du sbas// gcig ni byang gter pra dun tser// rnam snang thugs khar sbas te bzhag/ stag gi lo la 'byin par 'gyur// gcig ni yang gter 'dir sbas te// sbrul gyi lo la 'byin par 'gyur// gcig ni mkhA ri dgye ri phug// spre'u'i lo la 'byin par 'gyur// de yang 'dir ni ma bu tshang// yang gter rgyud gsum bu yi tshul// ci phyir ma'i bcud bsdud pa'o// don gsal rgyud mchog ma'i tshul// ci kun bskyed rang gzhung tshugs// de ltar zab phyir thugs gter yang// yang gter themsu 'di ma stan// de ltar sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor don// 'dis ston phyir na rgyud sor zhog// 'bres pa'i mon pes g.yog sa re// tig ka'i sbar mos bsdams sa re// lung drangs lto tshim bskus sa re/ /de phyir bka' rgyud rang sar zhog/ /don 'grol dka' na bla ma brten// tshogs brgya rtsa dang maN+Dala dbul// zhib tu dpe blta don la spyod// bltas pas grol ba kho na'o// shes rab blo ldan snying rtse can dang 'phrad par shog// //ci phyir gsang sngags ngo bo shes rab yin/ ithi / guhya/ rgya rgya rgya 1 25b4-40b1 rgyud kyi rgyal po nyi zla 'od 'bar mkhA klong rnam dag rgya mtsho klong gsal gyi rgyud zhes bya ba tan+t+ra rA dza sur+ya pra b+ha dzwa la a kar b+hyo ya shud d+ha tsa la tan tra nA ma gu ru la bstan pa 'byung ba'i dus ji tsam na lags// zhus pas nga'i yang snying nyi zla 'di// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bstan pa nug/ gsang sngags thugs kyi bstan pa dar// lnga brgya dus kyi mthA ma la// dus ngan zer zhing spyod ngan byed// rgya bod bye zhing rgyal khrims 'jig/ chos su rdzogs chen dar la ban de rnal 'byor dar// gos su re thul khyi thul dar la// lag cha dbyug pa mi mgo dar// da ltar sangs rgyas yin zer nyon mongs kha ma bri// zongs su chos 'tshong nyams myong glu ru len// spyod pa bab bcol kun klong tho cos 'gengs// man ngag grong skor rna ba rdzun gyis 'gengs// rnal 'byor zas nor 'dod phyir kha khar sprad te// rdzun ni ri khrod 'drims pa'i lad mo grong rgyu rnal 'byor byed// brtul zhugs gsang sngags spyod pa tho chos dgra bgegs 'gengs// de ltar byas pas tshe thung nad kyang mang// ma thub drag po 'byung po 'dus// bde gshegs byin rlabs ma thub dus// 'byung bas yi gser ma thub// mkhA 'gros bcol ba'i gter ma thub// skye 'grogs gtad pa'i blo mi thub// nyan thos 'dul ba'i khrims mi thub// btsun mos rang gi lus ma thub// rtsod pas 'dab rgyas byed dus su// pha spun nang rgyas byed pa'i dus// phyi yi so ga nang du zug/ lan cig de lta bu'i dus gcig mchis// ces gsungso// rgyud kyi rtse rgyal nyi zla 'od 'bar mkhA klong rnam dag rgya mtsho klong gsal gyi rgyud chen// rdzogs pa chen po yang ti// u ryan gu ru pad+ma dang// lo tsha ba ka ba dpal rtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal ma'i brag phug nang du sbas// mnga' bdag nyang ral pa can dang/ snye mo zhu yas gnod byin 'bar gyis gton// //gter rgya/ gsang rgya/ gtad rgya/ zab rgya/ ngo mtshar che'o// dge'o 1 rgyud kyi rtse rgyal nyi zla 'od 'bar mkhA klong rnam dag rgya mtsho klong gsal gyi rgyud las// phun sum tshogs pa dang chos tshig nyi shu rtsa gcig gi gleng slang bstan pa'i le'u ste dang poMW2PD19896ja7I2PD200201

92b4-103a2 rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa// chos sku skye med rig pa'i rgyud ces bya ba sin+d+ha mahA tib ta tshe da d+harma kA ya// a ba gi ti tan+t+ra nA ma de skad ces ni gsungs pa dang// de tshe 'dus pa rnaM bzhi la// rang seMs rtoD pa mngon 'gyur nas// dga' ba'i seMs kyi rang bzhin ste// rdoe seMdas don gsol pa// rtogs pa brjod pa'i don mthun pa// 'bras bu sangyas da lta myong// rang seMs ma ngang stugis phrad// de phyir da ltar kun bzang nyid// rdoe seMda' dga' ba che// 'dren mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshalo// de skad gsol ba'i don go nas// rdoe sems dpa' yang gsungs pa// sangyas thugs kyi byin brlabs las// dgos pa ma lus cud sdud pa// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs kyi don/ gdam ngag tshegs med nyid khu ni// dad ldan khyod la ngas bshad pa// don 'di rgyud la shin tu sbos// yang dag snying khu sems kyi bcud// thig le nyag cig mngon phyung ba// chos kyi gter gyi 'byung gnas 'di// snod ldan rnalyorrnams kyis kyang// gal te phyi rabs don ston na// sangyas chos skyong dbang du btsugs// gzhan la mi spel mna' bor nas// snod ldan man ngag 'chang bar bstan// tshoD kyi mchod pa ci nus bya// de ltar ma bcos chos bstan na// slob dpon tshe thung bar chod 'ong// bka' rku bla ma d+mod pa la// mi tshe 'di nyid da lta'i dus// nad dang kha yogs sn ogs 'ong// de phyir man ngag yang snying 'di// 'jig rten /grags pa nor 'dod phyir// don 'di ma spel sems la chongs// rdoe seMda'de skad gsungs// rdzoD pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa// chosku skye med rig pa'i rgyud las// rin po che gter gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba rdzogs+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma' la mi tra dang/ a tsarya dran pa yais kyi rang 'gyur byas te gtan la phab pa'o 1 rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa skye med rig pa'i rgyud las/ don gyi gleng bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste dang poMW2PD19896ja7I2PD200201

79a2-99b6 rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long gi rgyud ces bya ba badzra satwa d+he ke tsit+ta tan+t+ra nA ma de nas mkhA 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces gdams so/ rgyud 'di'i me lce bya'o/ dam tshig nyams pa rnams kyi gshed ma bya'o / zhes gdams so/ nga rgyal gyi sgra 'di skad ces bsgragso/ rag mo sa ma ya snying phyung bhyo bhyo/ ces brjod nas mi snang ba'i ngang du gshegso/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i bu log rtog sel byed la sogs te/ thub pa chen po drug dang / mi ma yin gyi 'khor rnams rjesu yi rang ngo/ ces rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long gi rgyud ces bya ba / yang gsang yang gab sbas pa'i rgyud / rdzogs pa chen po gtan la 'bebs pa / gzhonu dpa' bo stobs ldan gyis dur khrod me ris 'bar bar gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa rnams la rang rang gi rigs dngos su bstan pa'i bka' dam pas / gsang ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so/ / rgya rgya rgya// de yang rdo rje sems dpa' sgra don gyi man ngag tu bshad pa'o/ de bzhin du sgra las thabs kyi yan lag 'byung bar bstan pa'o/ sngags kyi gtan tshiD rgyas par bstan pa'o rdzogso/ /phugs mi lnga gter nas 'og gis / srid pa'i bu nyi ma spyan gyi byar gyis shig / ma phugs na yang gzhu khod la mnga' rgyob cig / des mi srid mi srid do / des nas mkhar nyi ma can du bros shig / de sgeg mo me long can gyis me long bltos shig / mkhar la bdag thogs shig /mkhar la 'obs lnga rims kyis bkor cig / mi lnga go chos cig / su nye ba thams cad sod la thong shig / rin po che'i rta lnga 'brog la yan du thong cig / rang gi yul la sa bcad cher gyis shig / sgeg mo me long can yangs pa can du / lha'i bu mdzes ldan chen po la bag mar thong cig / bu sa 'dzin du chu gcig / de ltar byas na rgyal srid zin du 'ong / ces don gyi snying po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung gnas / rig pa kha yan du gtong ba'i man ngag / snang ba ye shes kyi grogsu 'char ba'i man ngag / brda yi rdo rje 'chang gi gral thob pa'i man ngag / yang nas yang du sbas pa'i gsang ba yang khol du phyung ba / gang zag dbang po 'bring cig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangyas thob par byed pa'i cha rkyen man ngag / rin po che ze ba bcwo lnga pa / ston pa nyid kyis gsungs pa rdzogso/ / rgya rgya rgya 1 ces rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba yang khol du phyung ba / rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long gi rgyud chen po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang poMW2PD19896tha10I2PD200221

233a3 This text is divided into, 10 "bam po" and 12 "byung tshul bstan pa". The beginnings of each bam po are marked (but not their endings); and the ends of each byung tshul bstan pa, but not their beginnings. The beginning of the first byung tshul bstan pa is therefore uncertain; provisionally, we are marking its opening at the outset of the text. However, its ending is marked after ch. 6 and its subject matter repeats the title of chapter 6, so it may be that its opening should be at the beginning of ch. 6 (13a line 3). There is also some uncertainty regarding the beginnings of some of the subsequent byung tshul bstan pa: we are assuming that each begins where the previous section finished, but this cannot be entirely certain without careful examination of the contents of the text. In most cases, our assumption appears justified: thus, the beginning of the second does indeed seem to be indicated 15a line 3; the third 22a line 7 - 22b line 1; the fourth 40b line 5; the fifth 45b line 7 - 46a line 1; the seventh 92a line 4; the eighth 109a line 6-7; the ninth 126a line 1-2; the tenth 130b line 4-5; the eleventh 132b line 4; and the final (tha ma) one 135a line 7 - 135b line 1. However, the second byung tshul bstan pa, which has its reference after ch.8 (where we have marked its end), almost certainly should contain material from the folios following. Ch. 7, which in gTing skyes (and the Virginia catalogue) is included in the second byung tshul bstan pa, follows chapter 8 in our edition, although this does not seem to be a case of chapter misnumbering. The chapter titles for ch. 7, 8 and 9 agree in all the editions, but we have the references for ch. 7 and 8 in reverse order. What appears to have happened is that three folios have been misnumbered and misplaced in this edition, and are therefore in the wrong place. Folios 20, 21 and 22 should in fact be placed after 24 and before 25 Thus, in a comparison of our text against gTing skyes, gTing skyes‚Äüs Ch.7 corresponds to our 15a-19b.7, followed by 23a.1-24b.6. gTing skyes‚Äüs Ch.8 corresponds to our 24b.7, followed by 20a.1-22a.6. gTing skyes‚Äüs Ch.9 corresponds to our 22a.7-22b.7, followed by 25a.1-28b.7. Also in the case of the bam po divisions, our text clearly marks the beginning of the 2nd bam po after ch. 8, and we are leaving this division intact here. Yet here again, since part of ch. 7 and the beginning of ch.8 have moved ater the reference for ch.8 in our edition, these moved sections of text should actually be included within the 1st bam po.

256a2 3 de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gi bdag po/ /dpal shin tu dges pa chen po bde ba'i bdag nyid// rnaMr snang mdzad chen po bshad pa mthas slas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi mchog tu gsang ba// zla gsang thig le mchog tu pha rol phyin// gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin du dges pa/ rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po// skal pa'i mthas klas pa zhes bya ba gsum paMW2PD19896ma16I2PD200281
262b7 4 de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po// kun du bzang po chen po dpal shin du dges pa chen po'i bde ba chen po rdo rje seMda' shin du dges pa chen po'i bde ba la gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje// dam tshig dbang skur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyior chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa chen po// rdo rjernalyor ma chen mo tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ste bzhi paMW2PD19896ma16I2PD200281

145a2-213b4 dpal snying rje rol pa'i rgyud/ 'jig rten las 'das pa gsang ba'i mdo shrI ka ru na lo ka b+ha sA gu h+ya tan+ta ma su tra de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po zab mo mchog/ dpal snying rje rol pa'i rgyud / 'jigs rten las 'das 'das pa gsang ba'i mdo chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po /bidya' ka ra sing ha dang/ bi shwa mi tra dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba khu byin btsun pa mchog gi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phag pa'o// // slar rgya gar gyi lo tsa' mkhas par lob par// //bal po shrI gri'r tis gtan la phab ste/ skad gsar pas bsgyur nas/ /sog po mchog gi snying po dang/ an bkra shis dang/ bal mo gza' bkra shis rgya mtshos yon bdag bgyis nas/ mang yul byams sprin gtsug lag khang gi yang thog gi dbu rtser shin tu gsang ste/ skad gsal bar bsgyur ba'o// //slar yang rgya gar gyi pan t.i ta rdo rje gdan drung nas gshegs pa'i mkhas pa'i phung bcad pu/ 'jam dbyangs bshes gnyen gyi slob ma'i yang rab/ /shrI len tra bud+ha gar bhas /bka'i dam pa'i rgyud 'di bka' stsal to/ /de'i dus su khu byin btsun pa mchog gi shes rab/ mthar rgya gar yul du rdo rje gdan drung na/ panDi ta lnga brgya'i zhal mthong nas/ bka' drin mnos te/ sngags thams cad gtan la phab nas/ tan t.ra 'di yang pan t.i ta mkhas pa rnaMs las gtan la phab te/ phir byon pa dang / mang yul byams sprin du/ paN+Di ta shi len tra bud+d+ha gar bha la/ gus pasbtude gtan la phab po/ /dbang yang rdzogs par mnoso // dad pas yon du gser srang stong lnga brgya phulo// chibs gor bu dang dkar dang / dkar khra dang / sngon po dang / nag gro dang / spu can rigs can brgya lnga bcu phul lo/ /de nas bod yul du lha cig nyi 'od yab sras spyan drangs te/ gser srang lnga bcu dang / gor bu 'phra thugs can rgya phul nas/ 'ching bu bre gu ru gtan la phul nas/ /bka' drin mnos te/ de yang bshado// btsan pos yab yum dang/ sring mo dang/ btsun mo la sogs pa phul nas// spyi bo'i mchod gnasu bgyis te/ zhugs par gsol ba las ma snang te/ pan ti ta slar rgya gar yul du gshegso/ / de'i dus su btsan pos yum bcas la 'ching bu phyag sbal du/ phyag rgya btabs nas bzhago/ btsan po yum sras kyis kyang/ kun gyi thun mong ma laD pa'i gsang ba'i zab mo 'di/ nam gyi gung bcad nas/ thugs dam du mdzad do/ /gsang ba zab mo 'di'i don kun dang / mthun mong ma lags pas gzhan du ma bstan to/ /snod dang sbyar nas 'ching bu phyag sbaso 1 che mchog he ru gsangs ba la // bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa mchog tu gsungs pa las / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdoebtsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyi // mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes kyi / /dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'MW2PD19896tsha18I2PD200301

253b6-296a3 dam tshig thaMd kyi nyams chag skong ba'i lung lnga/ bshags pa thaMd kyi rgyud dri ma /med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sa ma ya sarba bi ti a nu sarba sa ni tan+t+ra bi mA la rA dza nA ma nyams chags thaMd skong ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bshags pa thaMd kyi rgyud dri ma med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogso// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma' la mi tra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa' ba gnyags dz+nyA na ku ma ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // bla med ye shes dkyil 'khor gang ba'i zla// tshems phreng 'od dkar 'dzum pa'i zhal sgo las// chos phung ganga''i klung rdul grangs kyis kyang// gzhan min 'gro kun bsam yas 'tshol ba bzhin/ /dbang por 'tsham gsung sman gyi sgrib gnyid nad// cha shas tsam mthar byas te gzhil nus rung// bya rog khyu mchog 'gros kyi khyad par ltar/ /yo ga'i lam gyis chod gcig tu myur// theg dgu'i nang tshan rnal 'byor chen po yi/ /rab 'bog glang po'i tan+t+ra las phyungs pa/ /sdig tshogs dri ma med par rtsa ba nas/ /'byin byed bshags pa'i rgyud rgyal 'di rmad byung/ /'gro khams nyon mongs rdul gyi dam tshig klung/ /ma dag rnyog mar gyur pa las sgrungs pa'i/ /gsang chen chos kyi nor bu ke ta ka / lus chen bsod nams zong gis nyos pa bzhin/ /'jig rten mig cig rnams kyi 'khrul med du/ /'phags yul skad las bod dper rab bsgyur cing/ /blun rmongs yi ge'i lhad kyis som nyi'i tshogs/ /glegs bam du mar gtugs te zhi ba mor spyad/ /tha snyad rtog ge'i glang pas gangs kyi ri/ /sngon mthing mig can la 'jug rdzas min yang/ /skal ldan rab rib sel ba'i gser thur gyis/ /phra rags chos kun gsal ba'i rtsa sman ljon// mi shes nongs pa tshangs pa'i 'khor lo yis// khas blangs dam bca'i mgrin pa nyer bcad kyang/ /thar pa'i srog rtsa mi chad 'chi med kyi/ /bdud rtsi'i ltung ba 'di las gzhan na gang// chos spong sgrib pa'i khung bur rtag nyal nas/ /ngan spyod dug lce skyong ba'i mkhas rlom sprul// snying la gnag dka'i ri dwags lte ba'i dri/ /gcil la dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas ngal/ /'on te gsang las ches gsang 'brug gi sgra/ /thos pa'i mod la rten bde'i mngal gyi khur// sbrul nus rig 'dzin rma bya'i bu mo rnams// dga' ba'i sgro gshog zlum por nga sgyur cig/ bsod nams 'bras bu mtho ris chu bo yi// 'gro rgyud sgrib gnyis khyab 'jug rkang pa'i dri// rab bkrus kun bzang go 'phang rgyal mtshan gyi/ /rtse mor mdzes pa'i tog 'od 'bar bar shog /ye dag rang rig nyi ma'i snying po la// skyon gyis ma gos gdod ma'i sangs rgyas zhal// gzhan nas 'tshol min mngon sum 'jal nus pa'i/ /bkra shis 'jig rten ma lus khyab par shog/ dri med bshags rgyud 'di nges gsang theg pa chen po'i lam du zhugs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs la med du mi rung bar mchis pa yig mkhan sna tshogs pa'i skyon gyis mthun mi mthun ci rigs snang ba glegs bam 'ga' zhig la nye bar btugs te shin /tu dag pa'i lugs su bgyis nas me 'brug dga' ldan phun tshogs gling du brkos pa'i tshe par byang smon lam dang bcas pa za hor gyi sngags smyon gang shar rang grol gyis sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni rigs pa 'dzin pa 'jam dbyangs grags pas bgyis pa sarba di kka'l yud ya bha wantu// // dri med rgyal po 256a2-259a5 gnod sbyin ma ru tse ro langs gsang ba'i rgyud yak+Sha ma ru guh+ya tan+t+ra de nas dpa' bo gar mkhan mchog dag/ gshin rje gshed po dam tshig lung du bstod pa'o// hu'MnamkhA yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// gshin rje d+mar po ral pa can// ru t.a myur du bsgral ba'i phyir// sgrub pa'i gnas 'dir dam la shog/ zhes dam bsgrags te bstod do// de nas dpa' bo gar mkhan la 'khor sems dpa' sems dang ma la sogs pas// bstod pa gar dang bcas pa/ hu'M sngon gyi rgyal bas lung phog ltar// tshe srog bdag po ma ru tse// sgrol ging bya bar dam bcas pas// dam rdzas bdud nyid 'di la kha raM kha hi// zhes gus pas mchod cing bstod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa// rnal 'byor can gyi rtog pa gzhom pa'i phyir// ma ru tse'i gar mkhan chog nyido// gar mkhan chog nyid rgyal po rnam thos sras// rnam thos sras nyid kar ma he ru ka/ don la the tshom med na rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas grub// dpa' bo gar mkhan mchog gi rgyud las// gnod sbying d+mar po'i tan+t+ra// gso byed spu gri'i so// las kyi mchog/ man ngag gi nying khu/ bdud gyi mda'/ las kyi gshin rje zhes bya'o// //gshin rje wa thod d+mar po'i rgyud tsha rgod d+myal ba'i las rdzogs so 1 ro langs gsang ba'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang poMW2PD19896zha21I2PD200331

158b2-175a1 dpal chen he ru ka'i gal po shrI he ru ka man tra gu h+ya tan tra nA ma de nas bsdung pa po rdo rje rnon po la sogs pa/ /he ru ka'i gal po'i lha thams cad kyis thams cad he ru kar rtogs te/ /rtogs pa phul lo/ /stong gsum ye shes dkyil 'khor du/ /dur khrod chen po byang chub lung/ /rtogs chen mnyam sbyor thugs kyi mdzod/ /bshad pas nyams pa'i snying po 'di/ /sangs rgyas gzhan nas spyan mi 'dren/ /nyid las kun rdzogs gzhal yas khang/ /dngos grub gzhan du mi slong ste/ /grub pa'i dkyil 'khor rang la shar/ /re dgos med pa ye nas gnas/ /gzhan nas mi slong nyid la rdzogs/ /mnyam nyid ma skyes mya ngan 'das zhes brjod do/ /shin tu dam zhing ngo tshar skyes nas ston pa la sna dbang lhag nas nyan to/ /de nas yang mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal po'i/ /gnod 'dul lha la sogs pa rnams la bka' stsal ba/ /gnod 'dul lha la sogs pa khyed rnams la ngas chos 'di bsdud la bshad do// dpal he ru ka'i gal po 'di ni// rgya che zhing don zab pa yin te// khyod kyis zin par gyis shig/ rtogs shig chongs shig/ he ru ka'i gal po 'di ni// dper na me dang 'dra ste// chu dun nas che ba ri rab kyang bsreg go/ theg pa chen po 'di ni// nyi ma'i zer dang 'dra ste// 'dzam bu gling bzhi dang/ ri'i rgyal po rnams dang/ kho ra khor yug dang/ gang rgyus dang/ g.ya' ri dang/ brag ri dang/ de'u la sogs thams cad gsal te/ /blang dor dang dbye ba srid mi byed do// de bzhin du ston pa'i thugs rje'i yang nyi ma dang 'dra ste/ /thugs rjes la 'bri bskol med do/ /de bzhin du sems can gyi rnam par shes pa yang de yang 'dra bar 'bri bskom med do/ /de yang mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos/ /lha gnod 'dul la sogs pa la bstsal pa/ /stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul rnyed la/ /lus zhing gi rdul rnyed du phul ba bas ni/ /tan tra chen po 'di'i don rtogs pa bsod nams che'o/ /dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa bas ni/ /tan tra chen po 'di'i zhal mthong ba bsod nams che'o/ /gang gis rlung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing bkur ba bas ni/ / tan tra chen po 'di yis sgrub pa la thang gcig yud tsam bzhugs pa bsod nams che'o/ /bskal pa stong du 'gro ba'i don byas pa bas ni/ /tan tra chen po 'di thang gcig tsam bcangs pa dang/ bklags pa bsod nams che'o// d+myal ba'i 'jig rten gnas ma gyur par thar pa'i lam ma yin// sangs rgyas sems can mya ngan 'das/ sems ni sangs rgyas kun gyi mes// yul ni ma sgrub bde chen klong// 1b1-28a4 bdud rtsi rin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud ces bya ba nA ma a mri ta rat+na gu h+ya dz+nyA na tsak+k+ra tan+t+ra de nas ston pa dpal kun tu bzang po des/ 'khor dang yongs kyi rnal 'byor pa la gdams pa dang gtad pa 'di yongsu gsungs pa/ 'khor thaMd la yang bzhad pa'i 'dzum gyis ltas nas 'di skad ces gsungso// ngas bstan pa'i gsang ba'i bdud rtsi 'di// bdud kyi lding rnam pa gsum gyis seMnthaMd lus rnams rnam par dben pa dang// ngag rnams rnam par dben pa dang/ sems rnamsrnaMr dben pa dang/ yang dag pa'i mthA la sku lnga ye shes 'byung bar byos shig/ 'di la ma mos pa gang la la dag la/ brag phug kha byang du brten du ltas pa bzhin du thugs rje chen po 'byung bar mi 'gyuro// 'di la mi mos pa gang la la dag bdud rtsi bum pa gang yang mgo la reg pa'i gnas medo// 'di la ni mos pa gang la la dag la gsang ba'i don 'di nyid tshig tsam yang thos par mi 'gyuro// 'di la mi mos pa gang dag la la// bstan pa gang la gnas pa'i don rnal 'byor dangrjesu rnal 'byor dang/ shin tu rnal 'byor gyi don gang yang thos par mi 'gyuro// 'di la mi mos pa gang dag la la// tshe rabs gang du yang tha na mu stegs pa'i chos kyang thos par mi 'gyur yid la yang mi byede// mthA khob rgyal po ngan pa'i rgyal khams kyi blon po'i tshul can du skye'o// 'di la nyan pa dang/ ston pa dang/ yid la byed pa dang/ 'dri ba dang/ 'chang ba dang/ snyan par smra ba dang/ nges pa'i don du byed pa dang/ bla mar byed pa dang/ bkur stir byed pa dang/ don gtan la 'bebs pa rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong ba yang yin/ chos gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa mthong ba yang yin// theg pa chen po'i dge 'dun dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor yid la byed pa la mthong ba yang yino// gzhan yang sa dang lam la mkhas pa yang 'di kho na'i yon tano// 'di la yid la byed pa rnams ni sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'o// chos yid la byed pa'o// dge 'dun yid la byed pa'o// de ltar yid la byed pa dag ni gsang ba dang/ gsang chen dang/ ye shes snying po'i don nyamsu blangs nas tshe 'di nyid las dang bden pa'i lam mthong/ gnyisu med pa'i sa thob/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyuro//gzhan yang ngas bstan pa'i chos phun sum tshogs pa 'di seMn yongs la smin par gyis shig/ 'dis dbang bskur bar gyis shig/ 'dis dbugs phyin par gyis shig/ 'dis ma dad pa rnams dad par gyis shig/ 'di khyed rnams la yongsu gtado// bcang ba dang/ bstan pa dang/ sgrub pa dang/ bri ba dang/ bklag pa dang/ blta ba rnams legs par byos shig/ nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu// lho phyogs bhe ta'i yul shed du// byams ldan mgon po klu zhes 'byung// /de yi bstan pa dam pa bzung// bdud rtsi bcud kyi yang snying// rnam pa gsum las// bam po khrIi nang nas snying po'i rgyud rin po che ye shes gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i phyogs gsang chen thig le'i rgyud gtad nas ston pa nyid mi snang bar
